message.entry: Input image must be a valid RGB Image.
Color patches were not detected. Try adjusting the Sensitivity parameter or turning off the Downsample parameter.
RegistrationPoints cannot be specified with Sensitivity or Downsample.
Color chart was not detected in the image. Try adjusting input parameters or manually specifying the Registration Points.
Detected RegistrationPoints are outside the bounds of the image.
RegistrationPoints must not exceed the size of the input image.
Input must be a colorChecker chart object.
